title: Team skins concerns
body: when will the tpa skins go back to legacy i want the skin but dont have the money right now

replies.body:
The [Official Announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift) doesn't list when they'll go back into the vault, but it's likely to be sometime during worlds or just afterwards.

Let me know if you have any questions.
It looks like all the esports legacy skins will be around until[ November 6](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift).

oh yes thank you so much
i can get alot more than just that my bday in soon thank god thank you sooo much
